name: Towaga
description:
Special launch offer!
TOWAGA is a fast-paced 2D Arcade/Shooter game where you play Chimù, a masked sorcerer entrenched atop the legendary temple of Towaga. React fast, stay focused and use your lightbeam to exorcise the creatures surrounding you.
Prove yourself worthy and the light shall reward your sacrifice.
We hope you’ll have as much fun discovering the game as we had making it
——————————
Content: 5 worlds and a special game mode “The Path of Madness”.
The game has a 60 Fps mode and a Left-handed option.
Better experience with headphones (Dynamic music)
Free majors updates will come during the following months, so stay tuned!
